label: 七菩提分
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: The seven conditions favorable to enlightenment, namely mindfulness, investigation of the dharma, exertion, rapture, repose, concentration, and equanimity (p. 570). [Skt. Bodhyanga]
